item1.thumblist_item_copy: From faculty awards to the number of books in our libraries, see Berkeley through its facts and figures.

item2.thumblist_item_copy: The Free Speech Movement, wetsuits, a treatment for malaria and earthquake science. You might be surprised to learn what Berkeley has contributed to the world.

item3.thumblist_item_copy: Right here, right now. Get a sense for what’s happening on the ground at Berkeley.

item4.thumblist_item_copy: Explore the rites, rituals and rallies that become a part of every Berkeley student’s campus experience.

item5.thumblist_item_copy: Ready to see Berkeley for yourself? Find out about daily campus tours, parking and public transportation.
